search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for BombBomb.com (bombbombcom.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for BombBomb is available at: [https://bombbomb.com/pricing/](https://bombbomb.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: BombBomb Pricing | Async Video Messaging - Start Today For Free

extracted_content.content:
Choose the BombBomb plan that works for you
-------------------------------------------

#### 45,000 businesses in 43 countries trust BombBomb to grow business.

Pay Monthly

Pay Annually

### Essentials

#### For individuals

#### All you need to create impactful video messages

### $33/mo

#### Includes:

*   Unlimited camera and screen recording
*   Unlimited videos, video length and storage
*   Custom branding
*   Video editing
*   Privacy - your data is never sold

#### **Need more seats?**  
Schedule a demo to customize your plan!  

### Plus

#### For individuals ready to maximize their marketing

#### Video messaging plus all-in-one marketing suite

### $49/mo

#### Everything in Essentials, and:

*   Unlimited mass email sending
*   Unlimited drip campaigns
*   Customizable email templates
*   Email template library
*   3,500 contacts included

#### **Need more seats?**  
Schedule a demo to customize your plan!  

### Enterprise

#### For business & enterprise teams

#### Scale video messaging company-wide

### Let's talk

#### Tailored solutions for your team:

*   User management & role-based access
*   Advanced analytics & reporting
*   Advanced security features
*   SSO and SCIM/OKTA
*   Premium integrations
*   Open API dev library

Compare plans
-------------

|  | Essentials | Plus | Enterprise |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 
#### Workspace

 |
| Number of videos | Unlimited | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Recording length | Unlimited | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Upload videos | Unlimited | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Video storage | Unlimited | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Video folders and subfolders | Unlimited | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Users per account | 1 | 1 | Unlimited |
| Search for videos in Workspace | ![Image 1: check-line](https://bombbomb.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/check-line.png) | ![Image 2: check-line](https://bombbomb.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/check-line.png) | ![Image 3: check-line](https://bombbomb.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/check-line.png) |
| Custom branding | ![Image 4: check-line](https://bombbomb.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/check-line.png) | ![Image 5: check-line](https://bombbomb.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/check-line.png) | ![Image 6: check-line](https://bombbomb.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/check-line.png) |
| Your data is not sold | ![Image 7: check-line](https://bombbomb.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/check-line.png) | ![Image 8: check-line](https://bombbomb.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/check-line.png) | ![Image 9: check-line](https://bombbomb.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/check-line.png) |
|

Discounts for Education & Non-profit
------------------------------------

### BombBomb serves a range of K-12, postsecondary, government, and non-profits. Contact us about discounts for qualifying organizations.

*   Use videos for fundraising, admissions, and alumni relations.
*   Mass email videos to your contacts and share on social media.
*   Personalize your outreach to select constituents.
*   Improve internal collaboration with remote workers.

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Does BombBomb limit my videos and storage?

No. Every BombBomb video email plan includes unlimited videos and a video library.

What is async video?

Connect face-to-face at different times- record a video when it’s convenient for you and send it your viewer to watch when it’s convenient for them. Record your screen, camera, or both to make communication more personal while doing business more efficiently.

BombBomb works on any device and with our mobile app. Pin to your browser extension, add-in to your favorite email, and integrate our video messaging platform with 67+ other systems.

Can I start a free trial of paid plans?

Yes, you can try our Essentials or Plus plans [free for 14 days](https://bombbomb.com/trial/). If you would like to explore our Teams solution, please [contact us](https://bombbomb.com/demo-request/), because we can help tailor it to be exactly what you and your team need.

What are my payment options?

You can be billed monthly, but you save with an annual plan. We accept credit card payments.

If you are interested in paying via ACH, reach out to our [sales team](https://bombbomb.com/demo-request/) here who can answer questions and assess your eligibility.

Does BombBomb work in regulated industries?

Yes. BombBomb serves leaders in financial services, mortgage, accounting, insurance, and other industries where compliance matters. For example, our Teams plan has robust features for compliance, such as a workflow that requires new videos to undergo an internal review before being sent.

Is there pricing for education, government, and non-profits?

Yes. BombBomb has special programs for education, government, and nonprofits. BombBomb can improve student success, donor relations, community outreach, and internal collaboration. Learn [how to get verified](https://bombbomb.com/non-profit-demo-request/) and pick the right BombBomb plan for your organization.

Do you sell my data?

No. Unlike many free video email products and free async video platforms, BombBomb does not sell your data. We do not access your private video content to mine data. We respect your [privacy](https://bombbomb.com/privacy/).

What are the differences between Essentials, Plus, and Teams?

All plans feature unlimited videos and workspace storage, plus a host of free integrations.

Unlike free video messaging platforms, BombBomb does not limit the numbers or lengths of videos. We do not sell your data or mine your data. We respect your  [privacy](https://bombbomb.com/privacy/). When it comes to “free” async video plans, we encourage you to read the fine print.

The Essentials plan is BombBomb’s video creator toolbox for solopreneurs and small but mighty teams. It includes unlimited camera and screen recordings, robust editing tools, custom branding, free integrations to email and other apps, and the ability to export your video essentials for the go-getter.

For teams of all sizes, the Plus plan is best for businesses that want to leverage BombBomb’s expanded workspaces, harness powerful automations, and administrative features. This isn’t just video; it’s a playbook for success.

Teams is the enterprise answer to next-gen video communication. From patented CRM integrations to top-tier compliance platforms and advanced administrative controls, it’s built for scale. With priority support and tailored onboarding, it’s enterprise video reimagined.

[Contact sales](https://bombbomb.com/demo-request/) to explore BombBomb for enterprise-level deployment. Make the most of async video with your CRM, mobile apps, backed by U.S.-based support.

Can BombBomb work inside my email?

Absolutely. Record your computer’s or mobile device’s screen of choice. Or just use the camera to be the video star. BombBomb integrates with Gmail, Outlook, and 67+ other applications. You can use it like any other add-in inside your email application or browser. You do not need to toggle between your email and BombBomb.

Email integration is included with every plan. To integrate BombBomb with Outlook, check out [this article here](https://support.bombbomb.com/hc/en-us/articles/360002136171-Installing-uninstalling-and-using-the-Outlook-add-in%20).

To send videos while using Gmail, [this article](https://support.bombbomb.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000439212-How-to-Use-BombBomb-s-Chrome-Extension-with-Gmail%20)  is the one you need.

To integrate Gmail servers with BombBomb, check out [this article](https://support.bombbomb.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000430271-Connecting-the-Gmail-integration).

What is a Workspace?

The workspace is an easy to use, centralized portal to create and edit videos, save them in a central hub, and manage contacts and automations.

Depending on your plan, the Workspace expands with more and more features and options.

Every plan includes video editing and branding, a personal storage workspace, and other premium features. Our Plus and Teams plans offer progressively robust Workspaces, automations, and administrative controls.

Compare any of our plans to free video email platforms. Free async video plans are free because they limit your videos, video lengths, storage–even your ability to add a logo or export your own data. Many freemium plans also may sell or trade your data.

Do I get a refund if I cancel?

Your plan remains active for the remainder of the cycle that was paid. To cancel your subscription, log into your account, hover over your name in the upper right corner, and click “Subscriptions.”

At the bottom of the Subscription & Payment page, you will find a link to cancel your subscription.

Before you leave, we hope you’ll contact our [support team](https://support.bombbomb.com/hc/en-us) first. Give us an opportunity to help you get the value from this powerful way to do business and collaborate.

Leading the way in async video since 2006  

--------------------------------------------

Get results. Get BombBomb.
